title: Master Skylark: A Story of Shakespeare's Time
description: A young boy with the voice of a skylark, joins a troupe of traveling minstrels. Spirited away from Stratford-on-Avon, he has many adventures, both frightening and triumphant, and finds love through one of the players. No other contemporary work has portrayed the life and times of Elizabethan England with such accuracy.
author: John   Bennett
